verses.verse: And there <S%H1961>was<s%> a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H6818>cry<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> and of their <S%H802>wives<s%> <S%H413>against<s%> their <S%H251>brethren<s%> the <S%H3064>Jews.<s%>

For there <S%H3426>were<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H587>We,<s%> our <S%H1121>sons,<s%> and our <S%H1323>daughters,<s%> are <S%H7227>many:<s%> therefore we take <S%H3947>up<s%> <S%H1715>corn<s%> for them, that we may <S%H398>eat,<s%> and <S%H2421>live.<s%>

Some also there <S%H3426>were<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H587>We<s%> have <S%H6148>mortgaged<s%> our <S%H7704>lands,<s%> <S%H3754>vineyards,<s%> and <S%H1004>houses,<s%> that we might <S%H3947>buy<s%> <S%H1715>corn,<s%> because of the <S%H7458>dearth.<s%>

There <S%H3426>were<s%> also <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> We have <S%H3867>borrowed<s%> <S%H3701>money<s%> for the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H4060>tribute,<s%> and that upon our <S%H7704>lands<s%> and <S%H3754>vineyards.<s%>

Yet <S%H6258>now<s%> our <S%H1320>flesh<s%> is as the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> of our <S%H251>brethren,<s%> our <S%H1121>children<s%> as their <S%H1121>children:<s%> and, <S%H2009>lo,<s%> <S%H587>we<s%> bring into <S%H3533>bondage<s%> <S%H853><s%> our <S%H1121>sons<s%> and our <S%H1323>daughters<s%> to be <S%H5650>servants,<s%> and some of our <S%H4480>daughters<s%> <S%H1323><s%> <S%H3426>are<s%> brought unto <S%H3533>bondage<s%> already: <S%H369>neither<s%> is it in our <S%H410>power<s%> <S%H3027><s%> to redeem them; for <S%H312>other<s%> men have our <S%H7704>lands<s%> and <S%H3754>vineyards.<s%>
And I was <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H2734>angry<s%> <S%H834>when<s%> I <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H853><s%> their <S%H2201>cry<s%> and <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1697>words.<s%>

Then I <S%H4427>consulted<s%> <S%H5921>with<s%> <S%H3820>myself,<s%> and I <S%H7378>rebuked<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H2715>nobles,<s%> and the <S%H5461>rulers,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> unto them, <S%H859>Ye<s%> <S%H5378>exact<s%> <S%H4855>usury,<s%> every <S%H376>one<s%> of his <S%H251>brother.<s%> And I <S%H5414>set<s%> a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H6952>assembly<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> them.

And I <S%H559>said<s%> unto them, <S%H587>We<s%> after our <S%H1767>ability<s%> have <S%H7069>redeemed<s%> <S%H853><s%> our <S%H251>brethren<s%> the <S%H3064>Jews,<s%> which were <S%H4376>sold<s%> unto the <S%H1471>heathen;<s%> and will <S%H859>ye<s%> <S%H1571>even<s%> <S%H4376>sell<s%> <S%H853><s%> your <S%H251>brethren?<s%> or shall they be <S%H4376>sold<s%> unto us? Then held they their <S%H2790>peace,<s%> and <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H3808>nothing<s%> <S%H1697><s%> to answer.

Also I <S%H559>said,<s%> It is <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H1697><s%> <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H859>ye<s%> <S%H6213>do:<s%> ought ye <S%H3808>not<s%> to <S%H1980>walk<s%> in the <S%H3374>fear<s%> of our <S%H430>God<s%> because of the <S%H4480>reproach<s%> <S%H2781><s%> of the <S%H1471>heathen<s%> our <S%H341>enemies?<s%>

I <S%H589><s%> <S%H1571>likewise,<s%> and my <S%H251>brethren,<s%> and my <S%H5288>servants,<s%> might <S%H5383>exact<s%> of them <S%H3701>money<s%> and <S%H1715>corn:<s%> I <S%H4994>pray<s%> you, let us leave <S%H5800>off<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H4855>usury.<s%>

Restore, <S%H7725><s%> I <S%H4994>pray<s%> you, to them, even this <S%H3117>day,<s%> their <S%H7704>lands,<s%> their <S%H3754>vineyards,<s%> their <S%H2132>oliveyards,<s%> and their <S%H1004>houses,<s%> also the <S%H3967>hundredth<s%> part of the <S%H3701>money,<s%> and of the <S%H1715>corn,<s%> the <S%H8492>wine,<s%> and the <S%H3323>oil,<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H859>ye<s%> <S%H5383>exact<s%> of them.

Then <S%H559>said<s%> they, We will <S%H7725>restore<s%> them, and will <S%H1245>require<s%> <S%H3808>nothing<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> them; <S%H3651>so<s%> will we <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H834>as<s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> <S%H559>sayest.<s%> Then I <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3548>priests,<s%> and took an <S%H7650>oath<s%> of them, that they should <S%H6213>do<s%> according to <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1697>promise.<s%>

Also <S%H1571><s%> I <S%H5287>shook<s%> my <S%H2684>lap,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3602>So<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> shake <S%H5287>out<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> from his <S%H4480>house,<s%> <S%H1004><s%> and from his <S%H4480>labor,<s%> <S%H3018><s%> <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H6965>performeth<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1697>promise,<s%> even <S%H3602>thus<s%> <S%H1961>be<s%> he shaken <S%H5287>out,<s%> and <S%H7386>emptied.<s%> And <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H6951>congregation<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H543>Amen,<s%> and <S%H1984>praised<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%> And the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> according to <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1697>promise.<s%>

Moreover <S%H1571><s%> from the <S%H4480>time<s%> <S%H3117><s%> <S%H834>that<s%> I was <S%H6680>appointed<s%> to <S%H1961>be<s%> their <S%H6346>governor<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> from the <S%H6242>twentieth<s%> <S%H4480>year<s%> <S%H8141><s%> even <S%H5704>unto<s%> the <S%H8147>two<s%> and <S%H7970>thirtieth<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H783>Artaxerxes<s%> the <S%H4428>king,<s%> that is, <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H8141>years,<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> and my <S%H251>brethren<s%> have <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H398>eaten<s%> the <S%H3899>bread<s%> of the <S%H6346>governor.<s%>

But the <S%H7223>former<s%> <S%H6346>governors<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> had been <S%H6440>before<s%> me were <S%H3513>chargeable<s%> <S%H5921>unto<s%> the <S%H5971>people,<s%> and had <S%H3947>taken<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> them <S%H3899>bread<s%> and <S%H3196>wine,<s%> <S%H310>beside<s%> <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H8255>shekels<s%> of <S%H3701>silver;<s%> <S%H1571>yea,<s%> even their <S%H5288>servants<s%> bore <S%H7980>rule<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H5971>people:<s%> but <S%H3651>so<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H589>I,<s%> <S%H4480>because<s%> <S%H6440><s%> of the <S%H3374>fear<s%> of <S%H430>God.<s%>

Yea, <S%H1571>also<s%> I <S%H2388>continued<s%> in the <S%H4399>work<s%> of <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H2346>wall,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> <S%H7069>bought<s%> we any <S%H7704>land:<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> my <S%H5288>servants<s%> were <S%H6908>gathered<s%> <S%H8033>thither<s%> <S%H5921>unto<s%> the <S%H4399>work.<s%>

Moreover there were <S%H5921>at<s%> my <S%H7979>table<s%> a <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H376><s%> of the <S%H3064>Jews<s%> and <S%H5461>rulers,<s%> beside those that <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> us from <S%H4480>among<s%> the <S%H1471>heathen<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> are <S%H5439>about<s%> us.

Now that <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H1961>was<s%> <S%H6213>prepared<s%> for me <S%H3117>daily<s%> <S%H259><s%> was <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7794>ox<s%> and <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H1305>choice<s%> <S%H6629>sheep;<s%> also <S%H6833>fowls<s%> were <S%H6213>prepared<s%> for me, and <S%H996>once<s%> in <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> <S%H7235>store<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> sorts of <S%H3196>wine:<s%> yet for <S%H5973>all<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1245>required<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> I the <S%H3899>bread<s%> of the <S%H6346>governor,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> the <S%H5656>bondage<s%> was <S%H3513>heavy<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5971>people.<s%>
Think <S%H2142><s%> upon me, my <S%H430>God,<s%> for <S%H2896>good,<s%> according to <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> I have <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H5921>for<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5971>people.<s%>
